Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.config

This package contains the base classes for configuring the BPEL engine.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAeConfigChangeListener Interface for listeners interested in receiving engine configuration change notices.
IAeEngineConfiguration Interface representing the static configuration settings for the BPEL engine.
IAeStorageChangeListener Listener interface for objects interested in receiving notice of storage constants changing after the engine starts.
IAeUpdatableEngineConfig Interface for the runtime mutable engine settings.
 

Class Summary
AeConfigDifUtil Utility class that compares the source and target maps and adds any diffs to the dif map.
AeDefaultEngineConfiguration Default engine configuration implementation.
AeDiffEngineConfiguration This class implements an engine configuration that saves/loads a list of engine config differences rather than an entire engine config document.
 

Exception Summary
AeFunctionContextExistsException Generated if there is an existing exception with a matching name, prefix or namespace.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.config Description

This package contains the base classes for configuring the BPEL engine.
The IAeEngineConfiguration and its standard impl, the AeDefaultEngineConfiguration represent the runtime configuration settings.
The IAeConfigChangeListener allows interested parties to register for engine configuration change notices.
